blurb: MoonScript is a dynamic scripting language that compiles into Lua. It gives you the power of one of the fastest scripting languages combined with a rich set of features.

key_features.title: Concise, Readable Code
key_features.content: MoonScript's expressive syntax means cleaner, more readable code with less boilerplate than Lua.

key_features.title: Seamlessly Integrate
key_features.content: Compiles to Lua, making it easy to embed into apps, games, or services.

key_features.title: High Performance
key_features.content: Benefits from Lua's fast VM (and LuaJIT), ensuring rapid execution of your compiled code.

key_features.title: Lightweight Footprint
key_features.content: Like Lua, it's small. The compiler is light, and generated code is efficient.

key_features.title: Functional Paradigm
key_features.content: Supports functional programming with features like comprehensions and implicit returns.

key_features.title: Increased Productivity
key_features.content: Concise syntax and powerful features boost developer productivity for rapid iteration.
